Do you have a build with full debug ? i.e. with line numbers
"Unknown Source" is not helpfull.

This seems to be race condition in the shutdown, I'll
take a look.

Ok a fix was put in the head, that should take care
of this ...  Not an easy one to chase down.

Let me know, by reopening the PR if still have troubles.

This bug has been verified on Eclipse build 20040603 and CDT build 
200406030301, and it passes.

Pixy.
